text: wlyn sa'alt -ayha alrswl- almshrkyn: man aladhi nzzal min alsahab ma'an fanbt bih al'ard min baed jfafha? lyqwlunn lak metrfyn: allah wahdah hu aladhi nzzal dhlk, ql: alhamd lilah aladhi 'azhar hjtk elyhm, bal 'aktharuhum la yaeqilun ma yanfaeuhum wala ma ydrhm, walaw eaqalu ma 'ashrakuu mae allah ghyrh
